byline.original: By WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM and SUSANNE CRAIG

abstract: Grand jury subpoenas are issued seeking records connected to New York State economic development program known as Buffalo Billion; action expands investigation into corruption in Albany to one of Gov Andrew M Cuomo's signature projects for upstate New York.
lead_paragraph: Manhattan federal prosecutors issued grand jury subpoenas seeking records related to one of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s upstate economic development programs.

headline.main: Corruption Inquiry Appears to Expand to a Signature Cuomo Program
headline.print_headline: Corruption Inquiry Appears to Expand to a Signature Cuomo Program

snippet: Manhattan federal prosecutors issued grand jury subpoenas seeking records related to one of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s upstate economic development programs.
